[Page Title: The James American Grill]

Dinner Menu Lunch Menu Reservations Order Takeout 
The James American Grill

The James is a neighborhood restaurant offering traditional American fare on James Island (Charleston, SC) and is locally owned and operated by The Neighborhood Dining Group. With an inviting, family-friendly atmosphere, The James offers familiar dishes and top-notch hospitality, creating a community gathering place to return to time and time again.

With ample parking and seating indoors, outdoors, and at the bar, The James is a place for any occasion, from a casual weeknight dinner with the family, to a celebratory weekend anniversary steak dinner.

Fri & Sat: 11:30am â€“ 10pmSun: 11:30am â€“ 9pm
The James is open seven days a week: Mon & Tue: 5pm â€“ 9pmWed & Thu: 11:30am â€“ 9pm Happy Hour (Bar & Lounge Only) Mon & Tue: 5pm â€“ 6pm, Wed â€“ Fri: 4pm â€“ 6pm 
It all starts with

The Food!

The James showcases contemporary and quality American cuisine at its best. The menu features our signature mushroom soup with puff pastry, dippinâ€™ shrimp, spinach & artichoke dip, and wedge salad; entrÃ©es like fresh seafood, crab cakes, steaks, and burgers; as well as healthy options and a childrenâ€™s menu.
Dinner Menu Lunch Menu Kids Menu 
Cocktails that

Raise the Bar

Whether it is a delicious cocktail, glass of wine or bottle of beer, The James has something for everyone. The cocktail menu balances classic cocktails with signature and playful riffs from the minds of our creative bartenders. Ice cold martinis will be featured in both classic and inspired preparations. Additionally, a quality collection of wines, craft beers and a generous spirits selection, including a well-appointed whiskey list will round out the drink selections.
Drink Menu Happy Hour 
Meet the Team

Mark Keiser

Executive Chef
Bio 
Melanie Delcourt

General Manager
Bio 
NDG CEO & Founder

DAVID HOWARD

David Howard, CEO & Founder of The Neighborhood Dining Group (Husk, Delaney Oyster House, Minero, The James), is committed to serving the communities in and around Charleston. Howard strives to offer the residents of James Island a convenient, quality restaurant experience with hospitality in a professional, guest focused environment with outstanding food and beverage.
info@ndgcharleston.com
